about_the_game:
Get the Decor Galore DLC Pack to add a little ✨sparkle✨ to your game!
 
The Decor Galore DLC Pack includes:
  • Fancy House Exterior
  • Purple Rug
  • Yellow Beanbag Chair
  • Moon & Stars Wall Decoration
  • Moonstone Rising Painting
detailed_description:
Get the Decor Galore DLC Pack to add a little ✨sparkle✨ to your game!
 
The Decor Galore DLC Pack includes:
  • Fancy House Exterior
  • Purple Rug
  • Yellow Beanbag Chair
  • Moon & Stars Wall Decoration
  • Moonstone Rising Painting

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Ubuntu 20.04)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850
  • Additional Notes: You're gonna love this game
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux (Ubuntu 22.04)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti / Radeon R9 280X

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Radeon Pro 555X
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: M1 Octa Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
